title: ‘It’s a Good Day for Us’: Lidl-Trek Comes Out Swinging in Show of Intention for 2024
content:
Mads Pedersen fastest in France, and Jonathan Milan hits out in Spain for debut wins in sneak preview of the team's intensions across the 2024 calendar: 'It’s a huge confidence boost for what’s to come.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s a Good Day for Us’: Lidl-Trek Comes Out Swinging in Show of Intention for 2024 on Velo.
author: ahood
